name: CROSS-STITCH: COLORING BOOK
description:
CROSS-STITCH: COLORING BOOK helps practice concentration and also have a great time! There are so many colorful, outstanding pictures to color!

All 1000 of them are free. We have a great number of categories in our paint by number app:
Animals. Just find the cutest buddy you want to color
Places. Find pictures of the real places and unique buildings beautifully painted in our coloring book
Flowers. The most beautiful and exotic flowers are already painted, all you need to do is to color them in our coloring by number book

And this is only a small part of the pictures we have in CROSS-STITCH: COLORING BOOK. Open the game and you will find mosaic, mandala, landscapes, fantasy, art and many more coloring pages.
Coloring has never been so easy, all pictures are marked by numbers. Open your color by number book and rediscover the simple relaxation and joy of coloring . Paint and share your favorite adult coloring pages with friends and family, let everyone see your fantastic coloring pages!

Colour your life with our adult coloring book !
You never get bored, there are more than 1000 free pictures in our сross stitch game, and we are constantly adding new images for you.

We are constantly working to make our game better, please, share your feedbacks: coloringart@playcus.com
